action_list.name: Add ABS target

attrs.script:
#script

prism_ip = '@@{NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL}@@'
username = '@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.username}@@'
password = '@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.secret}@@'
storage_container_name = '@@{NTX_CONTAINER_NAME}@@'
storage_container_uuid = ''
vgname = '@@{NTX_VG_NAME}@@'
target_vg_size = @@{NTX_TARGET_SIZE_TB}@@*1024*1024*1024*1024

api_url = prism_ip + "/PrismGateway/services/rest/v2.0/"

print "INFO: Retrieving storage container uuid for: {}.".format(storage_container_name)

# -*- Get Container UUID

get_container_uuid_url = api_url + "storage_containers"
try:
  response = urlreq(get_container_uuid_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  storage_containers = json.loads(response.content)
  for container in storage_containers['entities']:
    if container['name'] == storage_container_name:
      storage_container_uuid = container['storage_container_uuid']
except Exception as e:
	print "ERROR: Failed to get storage container uuid, check storage container name or check username/password"
	print e.message
	exit(1)

print "INFO: storage container uuid is: {}.".format(storage_container_uuid)

# -*- Check volume group existance

check_vg_url = api_url + "volume_groups"
response = urlreq(check_vg_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
vgs = json.loads(response.content)
for vg in vgs['entities']:
  if vg['name'] == vgname:
    print "ERROR: Volume group with name {} already exists.".format(vgname)
    exit(1)

print "INFO: Creating volume group '{}'.".format(vgname)

# -*- Create Volume Group

create_vg_url = api_url + "volume_groups"
payload = {
	"disk_list": [{
		"create_config": {
			"size": target_vg_size,
			"storage_container_uuid": storage_container_uuid
		},
		"index": 0
	}],
	"is_shared": True,
	"name": vgname
}

response = urlreq(create_vg_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False)
if response.status_code != 201:
	print "ERROR: creation of volume group '{}' failed.".format(vgname)

vg_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
task_uuid = vg_create_status['task_uuid']

sleep(5)

check_vg_creation_url = api_url + "tasks/" + task_uuid
response = response = urlreq(check_vg_creation_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
vg_create_status = json.loads(response.content)

if vg_create_status['progress_status'] != "Succeeded":
	print "ERROR: creation of volume group '{}' failed.".format(vgname)
	exit(1)
else:
	print "INFO: creation of volume group '{}' Successful.".format(vgname)
    
# -*- Get Volume Group Target IQN

check_vg_url = api_url + "volume_groups"
response = urlreq(check_vg_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
vgs = json.loads(response.content)
for vg in vgs['entities']:
  if vg['name'] == vgname:
    iscsi_target=vg["iscsi_target"]

print "TARGET_IQN=iqn.2010-06.com.nutanix:" + iscsi_target

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{address}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

print "INFO: Retrieving HYCU Node Initiator Name."

# -*- Retrieving HYCU Node Initiator Name

get_iscsiinitiator = api_url + "/administration/iscsiinitiator"
try:
  response = urlreq(get_iscsiinitiator, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  get_iscsiinitiator = json.loads(response.content)
  iqn = get_iscsiinitiator["entities"][0]["initiatorname"]
except Exception as e:
	print "ERROR: HYCU Node Initiator Name check username/password"
	print e.message
	exit(1)

print "INFO: Initiator Name is: {}.".format(iqn)

print "INITIATOR_IQN=" + iqn

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{address}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
target_name = "@@{HYCU_TARGET_NAME}@@"
data_service_ip = "@@{NTX_DATA_SERVICE_IP}@@"
data_service_port = "@@{NTX_DATA_SERVICE_PORT}@@"
target_iqn = "@@{TARGET_IQN}@@"

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

print "INFO: Creating target '{}'.".format(target_name)

# -*- Retrieving HYCU Node Initiator Name

payload = {
	"name": target_name,
	"description": "",
	"targetType": "I_SCSI",
	"allowedBackupStreams": 1,
	"encryption": False,
	"iScsiStorageDetails": {
		"port": data_service_port,
		"address": data_service_ip,
		"chap": False,
		"targetname": target_iqn,
		"username": "",
		"password": "",
		"mutualChap": False
	}
}

# -*- Checking existance of the target.
check_target_url = api_url + "/targets"
response = urlreq(check_target_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
targets = json.loads(response.content)
for target in targets['entities']:
  if target['name'] == target_name:
    print "ERROR: Target with name {} already exists.".format(target_name)
    exit(1)
    
# -*- Creating Target
create_target_url = api_url + "/targets"
try:
  headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
  response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers)
  if response.status_code != 202:
	print "ERROR: creation of target '{}' failed.".format(target_name)
  target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
  job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
  print "ERROR: Creation of target '{}' failed, check username/password".format(target_name) 
  print e.message
  exit(1)

    
jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
while(True):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code != 200:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'.".format(job_uuid)
  job_status = json.loads(response.content)
  if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
    print "INFO: creation of target '{}' successful.".format(target_name)
    break
  elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
    print "ERROR: Failed to create '{}'.".format(target_name)
    print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
    exit(1)
  else:
    print "INFO: creation of target '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(target_name)
    sleep(5)

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{address}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
target_name = "@@{HYCU_TARGET_NAME}@@"
afs_type = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE}@@"
afs_host = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_AFS_HOST}@@"
afs_sharedpath = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_AFS_SHARED_PATH}@@"
smb_username = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_SMB_USERNAME}@@"
smb_password = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_SMB_PASSWORD}@@"
smb_domain = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_SMB_DOMAIN}@@"
target_size = @@{NTX_TARGET_SIZE_TB}@@*1024*1024*1024*1024

if afs_type == "":
  print "INFO: 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE' is a mandatory variable"
if afs_host == "" and afs_sharedpath == "" and target_name == "":
  print "INFO: 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_HOST', 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_SHARED_PATH', 'TARGET_NAME' are a mandatory variable"

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"
  
if afs_type == 'NFS':
  print "INFO: Creating NFS target '{}'.".format(target_name)
  payload = {
      "name": target_name,
      "description": "",
      "targetType": "NFS",
      "allowedBackupStreams": 1,
      "encryption": False,
      "nfsFileSystemDetails": {
          "address": afs_host,
          "sharedPath": afs_sharedpath
      },
      "advertisedCapacityInBytes": target_size
  }
elif afs_type == 'SMB':
  print "INFO: Creating ABS target '{}'.".format(target_name)
  payload = {
	"name": target_name,
	"description": "",
	"targetType": "SMB",
    "allowedBackupStreams": 1,
    "encryption": False,
	"smbFileSystemDetails": {
		"username": smb_username,
		"password": smb_password,
		"domain": smb_domain,
		"sharedPath": afs_sharedpath,
		"address": afs_host
	}
  }
else:
  print "ERROR: 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE' can only be 'SMB/NFS'.".format(target_name)
  exit(1)
  
# -*- Checking existance of the target.
check_target_url = api_url + "/targets"
response = urlreq(check_target_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
targets = json.loads(response.content)
for target in targets['entities']:
  if target['name'] == target_name:
    print "ERROR: Target with name {} already exists.".format(target_name)
    exit(1)
    
# -*- Creating Target
create_target_url = api_url + "/targets"
try:
  headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
  response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers)
  if response.status_code != 202:
	print "ERROR: creation of target '{}' failed.".format(target_name)
  target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
  job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
  print "ERROR: Creation of target '{}' failed, check username/password".format(target_name) 
  print e.message
  exit(1)

jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
while(True):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code != 200:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'.".format(job_uuid)
  job_status = json.loads(response.content)
  if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
    print "INFO: creation of target '{}' successful.".format(target_name)
    break
  elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
    print "ERROR: Failed to create '{}'.".format(target_name)
    print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
    exit(1)
  else:
    print "INFO: creation of target '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(target_name)
    sleep(5)

action_list.description: System action for installing an application
action_list.name: action_install

attrs.script:
#script

hycu_ip = '@@{address}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
pe_ip = "@@{NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL}@@"
pe_username = "@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.username}@@"
pe_password = "@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.secret}@@"

if pe_ip == "":
  "ERROR: 'NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL' should not be empty".format(pe_ip)
  exit(1)
  
if pe_username == "" and pe_password == "":
  "ERROR: 'NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU' should not be empty, plese fill in the PRISM credentials for hycu".format(pe_ip)
  exit(1)

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

# -*- Waiting for api to be ready
print "INFO: Waiting for HYCU to start service."
get_api_url = api_url + "/administration/httpserver"
count = 0
while(True):
  if count == 20:
    print "ERROR: Timout waiting for HYCU service.".format(pe_ip)
  try:
    response = urlreq(get_api_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    get_api_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if get_api_status["message"]["type"] == "OK":
      break
  except Exception as e:
      print "INFO: Waiting for HYCU to start service."
      print e.message
      sleep(10)
      count += 1

print "INFO: Adding Storage cluster '{}'.".format(pe_ip)

# -*- Retrieving HYCU Node Initiator Name

payload = {
	"username": pe_username,
	"url": pe_ip,
	"hypervisorType": "KVM",
	"password": pe_password
}

create_target_url = api_url + "/administration/clusters"
try:
  headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
  response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers, timeout=30)
  if response.status_code != 202:
	print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
  target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
  job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
  print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed, check username/password".format(pe_ip) 
  print e.message
  exit(1)
    
jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
while(True):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code != 200:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'.".format(job_uuid)
  job_status = json.loads(response.content)
  if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
    print "INFO: Adding cluster '{}' successful.".format(pe_ip)
    break
  elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
    print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
    print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
    exit(1)
  else:
    print "INFO: creation of Cluster '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(pe_ip)
    sleep(5)

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{address}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
pe_ips = "@@{NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTER_URL}@@"
pe_username = "@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.username}@@"
pe_password = "@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.secret}@@"

if pe_ips == "":
  "INFO: 'NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTER_URL' were not specified exiting.".format(pe_ip) 
  exit(0)
  
  
if pe_username == "" and pe_password == "":
  "ERROR: 'NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU' should not be empty, plese fill in the PRISM credentials for hycu".format(pe_ip) 
  exit(1)

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

print "INFO: Adding prod clusters '{}'.".format(pe_ips)

# -*- Retrieving HYCU Node Initiator Name
for pe_ip in pe_ips.split(","):
  if pe_ip == "":
    print "WARNING: PE IP cannot be empty: '{}'.".format(pe_ip)
    continue

  payload = {
      "username": pe_username,
      "url": pe_ip,
      "hypervisorType": "KVM",
      "password": pe_password
  }

  create_target_url = api_url + "/administration/clusters"
  try:
    headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
    response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers, timeout=30)
    if response.status_code != 202:
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
    target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
    job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
  except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed, check username/password".format(pe_ip) 
    print e.message
    exit(1)
  
  jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
  while(True):
    response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    if response.status_code != 200:
      print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'.".format(job_uuid)
    job_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{}' successful.".format(pe_ip)
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      exit(1)
    else:
      print "INFO: Addition of Cluster '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(pe_ip)
      sleep(5)

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{address}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
pe_ips = "@@{NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTER_URL}@@"
pe_username = "@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.username}@@"
pe_password = "@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.secret}@@"

if pe_ips == "":
  "INFO: 'NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTER_URL' were not specified exiting.".format(pe_ip) 
  exit(0)
  
  
if pe_username == "" and pe_password == "":
  "ERROR: 'NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU' should not be empty, plese fill in the PRISM credentials for hycu".format(pe_ip) 
  exit(1)

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

print "INFO: Adding prod clusters '{}'.".format(pe_ips)

# -*- Retrieving HYCU Node Initiator Name
for pe_ip in pe_ips.split(","):
  if pe_ip == "":
    print "WARNING: PE IP cannot be empty: '{}'.".format(pe_ip)
    continue

  payload = {
      "username": pe_username,
      "url": pe_ip,
      "hypervisorType": "KVM",
      "password": pe_password
  }

  create_target_url = api_url + "/administration/clusters"
  try:
    headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
    response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers, timeout=30)
    if response.status_code != 202:
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
    target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
    job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
  except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed, check username/password".format(pe_ip) 
    print e.message
    exit(1)
  
  jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
  while(True):
    response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    if response.status_code != 200:
      print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'.".format(job_uuid)
    job_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{}' successful.".format(pe_ip)
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      exit(1)
    else:
      print "INFO: Addition of Cluster '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(pe_ip)
      sleep(5)

attrs.script:
#script

hycu_ip = '@@{address}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
pe_ip = "@@{NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL}@@"
pe_username = "@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.username}@@"
pe_password = "@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.secret}@@"

if pe_ip == "":
  "ERROR: 'NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL' should not be empty".format(pe_ip)
  exit(1)
  
if pe_username == "" and pe_password == "":
  "ERROR: 'NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU' should not be empty, plese fill in the PRISM credentials for hycu".format(pe_ip)
  exit(1)

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

# -*- Waiting for api to be ready
print "INFO: Waiting for HYCU to start service."
get_api_url = api_url + "/administration/httpserver"
count = 0
while(True):
  if count == 20:
    print "ERROR: Timout waiting for HYCU service.".format(pe_ip)
  try:
    response = urlreq(get_api_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    get_api_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if get_api_status["message"]["type"] == "OK":
      break
  except Exception as e:
      print "INFO: Waiting for HYCU to start service."
      print e.message
      sleep(10)
      count += 1

print "INFO: Adding Storage cluster '{}'.".format(pe_ip)

# -*- Retrieving HYCU Node Initiator Name

payload = {
	"username": pe_username,
	"url": pe_ip,
	"hypervisorType": "KVM",
	"password": pe_password
}

create_target_url = api_url + "/administration/clusters"
try:
  headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
  response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers, timeout=30)
  if response.status_code != 202:
	print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
  target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
  job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
  print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed, check username/password".format(pe_ip) 
  print e.message
  exit(1)
    
jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
while(True):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code != 200:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'.".format(job_uuid)
  job_status = json.loads(response.content)
  if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
    print "INFO: Adding cluster '{}' successful.".format(pe_ip)
    break
  elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
    print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
    print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
    exit(1)
  else:
    print "INFO: creation of Cluster '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(pe_ip)
    sleep(5)

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{address}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
pe_ips = "@@{NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTER_URL}@@"
pe_username = "@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.username}@@"
pe_password = "@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.secret}@@"

if pe_ips == "":
  "INFO: 'NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTER_URL' were not specified exiting.".format(pe_ip) 
  exit(0)
  
  
if pe_username == "" and pe_password == "":
  "ERROR: 'NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU' should not be empty, plese fill in the PRISM credentials for hycu".format(pe_ip) 
  exit(1)

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

print "INFO: Adding prod clusters '{}'.".format(pe_ips)

# -*- Retrieving HYCU Node Initiator Name
for pe_ip in pe_ips.split(","):
  if pe_ip == "":
    print "WARNING: PE IP cannot be empty: '{}'.".format(pe_ip)
    continue

  payload = {
      "username": pe_username,
      "url": pe_ip,
      "hypervisorType": "KVM",
      "password": pe_password
  }

  create_target_url = api_url + "/administration/clusters"
  try:
    headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
    response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers, timeout=30)
    if response.status_code != 202:
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
    target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
    job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
  except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed, check username/password".format(pe_ip) 
    print e.message
    exit(1)
  
  jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
  while(True):
    response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    if response.status_code != 200:
      print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'.".format(job_uuid)
    job_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{}' successful.".format(pe_ip)
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      exit(1)
    else:
      print "INFO: Addition of Cluster '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(pe_ip)
      sleep(5)

action_list.description: Add

attrs.script:
#script

prism_ip = '@@{NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL}@@'
username = '@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.username}@@'
password = '@@{NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU.secret}@@'
storage_container_name = '@@{NTX_CONTAINER_NAME}@@'
storage_container_uuid = ''
vgname = '@@{NTX_VG_NAME}@@'
target_vg_size = @@{NTX_TARGET_SIZE_TB}@@*1024*1024*1024*1024

api_url = prism_ip + "/PrismGateway/services/rest/v2.0/"

print "INFO: Retrieving storage container uuid for: {}.".format(storage_container_name)

# -*- Get Container UUID

get_container_uuid_url = api_url + "storage_containers"
try:
  response = urlreq(get_container_uuid_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  storage_containers = json.loads(response.content)
  for container in storage_containers['entities']:
    if container['name'] == storage_container_name:
      storage_container_uuid = container['storage_container_uuid']
except Exception as e:
	print "ERROR: Failed to get storage container uuid, check storage container name or check username/password"
	print e.message
	exit(1)

print "INFO: storage container uuid is: {}.".format(storage_container_uuid)

# -*- Check volume group existance

check_vg_url = api_url + "volume_groups"
response = urlreq(check_vg_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
vgs = json.loads(response.content)
for vg in vgs['entities']:
  if vg['name'] == vgname:
    print "ERROR: Volume group with name {} already exists.".format(vgname)
    exit(1)

print "INFO: Creating volume group '{}'.".format(vgname)

# -*- Create Volume Group

create_vg_url = api_url + "volume_groups"
payload = {
	"disk_list": [{
		"create_config": {
			"size": target_vg_size,
			"storage_container_uuid": storage_container_uuid
		},
		"index": 0
	}],
	"is_shared": True,
	"name": vgname
}

response = urlreq(create_vg_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False)
if response.status_code != 201:
	print "ERROR: creation of volume group '{}' failed.".format(vgname)

vg_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
task_uuid = vg_create_status['task_uuid']

sleep(5)

check_vg_creation_url = api_url + "tasks/" + task_uuid
response = response = urlreq(check_vg_creation_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
vg_create_status = json.loads(response.content)

if vg_create_status['progress_status'] != "Succeeded":
	print "ERROR: creation of volume group '{}' failed.".format(vgname)
	exit(1)
else:
	print "INFO: creation of volume group '{}' Successful.".format(vgname)
    
# -*- Get Volume Group Target IQN

check_vg_url = api_url + "volume_groups"
response = urlreq(check_vg_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
vgs = json.loads(response.content)
for vg in vgs['entities']:
  if vg['name'] == vgname:
    iscsi_target=vg["iscsi_target"]

print "TARGET_IQN=iqn.2010-06.com.nutanix:" + iscsi_target

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{address}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

print "INFO: Retrieving HYCU Node Initiator Name."

# -*- Retrieving HYCU Node Initiator Name

get_iscsiinitiator = api_url + "/administration/iscsiinitiator"
try:
  response = urlreq(get_iscsiinitiator, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  get_iscsiinitiator = json.loads(response.content)
  iqn = get_iscsiinitiator["entities"][0]["initiatorname"]
except Exception as e:
	print "ERROR: HYCU Node Initiator Name check username/password"
	print e.message
	exit(1)

print "INFO: Initiator Name is: {}.".format(iqn)

print "INITIATOR_IQN=" + iqn

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{address}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
target_name = "@@{HYCU_TARGET_NAME}@@"
data_service_ip = "@@{NTX_DATA_SERVICE_IP}@@"
data_service_port = "@@{NTX_DATA_SERVICE_PORT}@@"
target_iqn = "@@{TARGET_IQN}@@"

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

print "INFO: Creating target '{}'.".format(target_name)

# -*- Retrieving HYCU Node Initiator Name

payload = {
	"name": target_name,
	"description": "",
	"targetType": "I_SCSI",
	"allowedBackupStreams": 1,
	"encryption": False,
	"iScsiStorageDetails": {
		"port": data_service_port,
		"address": data_service_ip,
		"chap": False,
		"targetname": target_iqn,
		"username": "",
		"password": "",
		"mutualChap": False
	}
}

# -*- Checking existance of the target.
check_target_url = api_url + "/targets"
response = urlreq(check_target_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
targets = json.loads(response.content)
for target in targets['entities']:
  if target['name'] == target_name:
    print "ERROR: Target with name {} already exists.".format(target_name)
    exit(1)
    
# -*- Creating Target
create_target_url = api_url + "/targets"
try:
  headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
  response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers)
  if response.status_code != 202:
	print "ERROR: creation of target '{}' failed.".format(target_name)
  target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
  job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
  print "ERROR: Creation of target '{}' failed, check username/password".format(target_name) 
  print e.message
  exit(1)

    
jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
while(True):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code != 200:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'.".format(job_uuid)
  job_status = json.loads(response.content)
  if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
    print "INFO: creation of target '{}' successful.".format(target_name)
    break
  elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
    print "ERROR: Failed to create '{}'.".format(target_name)
    print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
    exit(1)
  else:
    print "INFO: creation of target '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(target_name)
    sleep(5)

action_list.name: Add ABS target

attrs.script:
#script

hycu_ip = '@@{address}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
target_name = "@@{HYCU_TARGET_NAME}@@"
afs_type = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE}@@"
afs_host = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_AFS_HOST}@@"
afs_sharedpath = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_AFS_SHARED_PATH}@@"
smb_username = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_SMB_USERNAME}@@"
smb_password = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_SMB_PASSWORD}@@"
smb_domain = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_SMB_DOMAIN}@@"
target_size = @@{NTX_TARGET_SIZE_TB}@@*1024*1024*1024*1024

if afs_type == "":
  print "INFO: 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE' is a mandatory variable"
if afs_host == "" and afs_sharedpath == "" and target_name == "":
  print "INFO: 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_HOST', 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_SHARED_PATH', 'TARGET_NAME' are a mandatory variable"

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"
  
if afs_type == 'NFS':
  print "INFO: Creating NFS target '{}'.".format(target_name)
  payload = {
      "name": target_name,
      "description": "",
      "targetType": "NFS",
      "allowedBackupStreams": 1,
      "encryption": False,
      "nfsFileSystemDetails": {
          "address": afs_host,
          "sharedPath": afs_sharedpath
      },
      "advertisedCapacityInBytes": target_size
  }
elif afs_type == 'SMB':
  print "INFO: Creating ABS target '{}'.".format(target_name)
  payload = {
	"name": target_name,
	"description": "",
	"targetType": "SMB",
    "allowedBackupStreams": 1,
    "encryption": False,
	"smbFileSystemDetails": {
		"username": smb_username,
		"password": smb_password,
		"domain": smb_domain,
		"sharedPath": afs_sharedpath,
		"address": afs_host
	}
  }
else:
  print "ERROR: 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE' can only be 'SMB/NFS'.".format(target_name)
  exit(1)
  
# -*- Checking existance of the target.
check_target_url = api_url + "/targets"
response = urlreq(check_target_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
targets = json.loads(response.content)
for target in targets['entities']:
  if target['name'] == target_name:
    print "ERROR: Target with name {} already exists.".format(target_name)
    exit(1)
    
# -*- Creating Target
create_target_url = api_url + "/targets"
try:
  headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
  response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers)
  if response.status_code != 202:
	print "ERROR: creation of target '{}' failed.".format(target_name)
  target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
  job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
  print "ERROR: Creation of target '{}' failed, check username/password".format(target_name) 
  print e.message
  exit(1)

jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
while(True):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code != 200:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'.".format(job_uuid)
  job_status = json.loads(response.content)
  if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
    print "INFO: creation of target '{}' successful.".format(target_name)
    break
  elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
    print "ERROR: Failed to create '{}'.".format(target_name)
    print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
    exit(1)
  else:
    print "INFO: creation of target '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(target_name)
    sleep(5)
